# init(playerIDs:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a leaderboard request to retrieve the scores of a specific group of players.

## Declaration

```swift
init?(playerIDs: [String]?)
```

## Parameters

- **playerIDs**: An array of `NSString` objects that holds the player identifier strings of the players to retrieve.

## Return Value

An initialized leaderboard request.

## Discussion

A leaderboard object that you initialize with this method ignores the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKLeaderboard/playerScope-swift.property] and [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKLeaderboard/range] properties. Instead, it retrieves scores for the specific list of players whose identifiers are in the `playerIDs` parameter.

## Deprecated initializers

- **init(players:)**: Initializes a leaderboard request to retrieve the scores of a specific group of players.
